ovdesc.p: The DD.ITEM.REJECT application is used to reject inward claims which are received.

In this application the mandate reference, Currency, Amount, Inward account etc can be given, which in turn can create a DD.ITEM with direction as "INWARD". These details can be sent to the bank that originally sent the Claim along with return reason. However the file generation as per the required file format and rejection accounting has to be handled through local interface.

Records can be created manually or can be populated using local OFS routines. Since the record creation conditions are handled locally there is no validation performed for any of the fields other than those mentioned in the respective field level help.
